title: No power interruption between 12 – 6 tomorrow (01)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) states that no power interruption will take place between 12:00 AM midnight to 6:00 AM except few areas tomorrow (01).
When God gives rain and CPC gives fuel, CEB can give power: CEB Chairman
Operations of Manning Market disrupted for first time in history due to power cuts
